title: Happy Birthday, Ai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Whew~ We sure ran a lot! The Rainbow Bridge is beautiful, as usual... Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What’s up, Mia?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Come with me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay, but... I’m kind of hungry from all that running. Are we going to get some bread?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh? But I’m hungry...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It’s because there’s a party...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Huh? Wait, could it be...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah! It’s your birthday party, Ai! You keep running off, so I’ve been waiting forever! Let’s go! Oh, and... happy birthday, Ai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
